sourcesContent: // ** Reactstrap Imports import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardBody, CardText, Input } from 'reactstrap' const TextareaDefault = () => { return ( Default To create a Textarea use type="textarea" with reactstrap Input tag. ) } export default TextareaDefault
